loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
googleSuccessDescription: You've successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover your potential, heal your wounds, and connect with your true essence.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us in one of our upcoming encounters with the sacred medicine.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony. Click save when you're done.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide a media URL or upload a file.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, a powerful brew resulting from the union of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a unique synergy that opens the doors to perception, allowing for deep healing and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual level. It purifies the body of toxins, helps release emotional blocks and limiting beliefs, and facilitates a profound connection with your inner wisdom and the universe. It is a journey of self-discovery guided by the spirit of the plants.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, guides, and heals. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with this ancient wisdom. It reveals what needs to be seen, healed, and understood, always with love and respect for each individual's process. It is a path to empowerment and liberation.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and clarity in their lives, understanding their path and mission more deeply.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of deep traumas, fears, and anxieties, promoting emotional balance and physical well-being.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and strengthens the connection with your inner self, with others, and with the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the energy of the group enhances individual healing. We create a space of trust and respect where everyone feels safe to explore their inner world, supported by the community.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized session designed for those seeking a more focused and deep process. It is ideal for working on specific topics or for those who prefer a more contained environment for their first experience.
guidesPageSubtitle: Beings of light and love, with years of experience and a deep commitment to service, who will accompany you with respect and care on your healing journey.
editGuideDescription: Modify the information of this guide. Your changes will be saved automatically.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the guide's profile.
preparationPageTitle: Your Path to Transformation Begins Here
preparationPageSubtitle: Preparation is a fundamental act of respect and opening towards the sacred medicine. A conscious preparation of body, mind, and spirit allows for a deeper and more revealing experience.
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin with a specific diet and a clear intention.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred moment of encounter with the medicine in a safe and loving space.
experienceProcessDescription: A unique and personal journey of visions, emotions, and revelations.
integrationProcessDescription: The process of bringing the teachings of the ceremony into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: The diet is a purification of the body to receive the medicine in the best way.
mentalPrepSubtitle: A calm mind is a fertile ground for the seeds of healing.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open the heart.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, dreams, and emotions before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The most important preparation is the willingness of the heart. Come with an open mind, without expectations, and with the confidence that you will receive what you need for your highest good. Allow yourself to be vulnerable, to feel, and to release. This is your moment of healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your sacred space with these essential items.
preparationCtaTitle: Ready to take the next step?
preparationCtaDescription: Our preparation guide is the first chapter of your transformation story. Discover everything you need to know to start this journey with confidence and serenity.
contactCommunityText: We are a community with a presence in San Carlos and Guanacaste. We are here to answer your questions and accompany you on your path. Follow us on our social networks to stay connected.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's colors. Use HSL values (e.g., 20 14.3% 4.1%).
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: List of all users registered in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to fill out our initial questionnaire to get to know you better and prepare for your healing process at El Arte de Sanar. You can fill it out here: [LINK]
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will help us ensure a safe and beneficial experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants or anxiety medication?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of serious mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or explore...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive personalized guidance.
tourWelcomeDescription: Before we begin a brief tour, could you provide us with your phone number? This will help us stay in touch about your process.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use it for important communications about your ceremonies.
tourPhoneNumberError: Could not save the phone number.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and testimonials from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: This is where you'll find our next scheduled ceremonies. You can view details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Now, let's go to an important step: the health questionnaire. Your honesty helps us take care of you.
dialogSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. The next step is to prepare your body and mind for the ceremony. Our guide will help you.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the answers submitted by the user.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the past ceremonies carousel.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: Enter a video URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the video from the carousel.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review the interactions between users and the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to see the details.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, I am the Spiritual Guide from 'El Arte de Sanar'. How can I help you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, effects, and sacred nature of Ayahuasca.
exploreCeremoniesDescription: Discover our upcoming events, details, and how to participate.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your journey.
